topics.title: Describe Your Hotel Check-in Experience
topics.prompt: Talk about a time you checked into a hotel. What happened?
topics.hint: 用英文描述你入住飯店的經驗，說說櫃檯接待、拿到房間鑰匙等過程，3-5句。
topics.sample: Last summer, I checked into a hotel with my family. The receptionist was very friendly and gave me the room key quickly. Our room was on the third floor and it was very clean.

topics.title: Ask for Directions
topics.prompt: Imagine you are lost in a city. Ask someone for directions to a place.
topics.hint: 模擬迷路時，問路到藥局、ATM或郵局的英語句子，至少3句。
topics.sample: Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the pharmacy? I need some medicine. Is it far from here?

topics.title: Describe a City Map
topics.prompt: Describe how to get from the hotel to three different places in a city.
topics.hint: 描述如何從飯店走到藥局、郵局、或購物中心，用英文說明方向，約4-5句。
topics.sample: From the hotel, you take the lift to the second floor. Then, turn left and walk to the end of the corridor for the room. To get to the pharmacy, turn right at the corner and go straight. The post office is next to the museum across the street.

topics.title: Share Your Favorite Place in Town
topics.prompt: Talk about your favorite place in your town and why you like it.
topics.hint: 分享你最喜歡的市內地點和喜歡原因，可以是商場、公園或其他，3-5句。
topics.sample: My favorite place in town is the shopping mall. It has many stores and a nice cinema. I enjoy going there to watch movies and shop with my friends.

topics.title: Describe a Surprise Plan
topics.prompt: Describe a time when someone surprised you with a plan or gift.
topics.hint: 說說有人帶給你的驚喜，像是租車或其他活動，3-5句。
topics.sample: One day, my friend surprised me by renting a car. We drove to a nearby beach for a picnic. It was a wonderful day and I really enjoyed the surprise.

topics.title: Explain How to Use an Elevator
topics.prompt: Explain in English how to use an elevator to reach your hotel room.
topics.hint: 描述搭乘電梯到達飯店房間的過程，簡單方向與步驟，3-4句。
topics.sample: You take the elevator on the left side of the lobby. Press the button for the second floor. When you get off, turn left and your room is at the end of the corridor on the right.

topics.title: Describe Asking for Help
topics.prompt: Describe a time you asked a stranger for help. What did you say and what was their response?
topics.hint: 分享一次向陌生人求助的經驗，說出你問了什麼，對方怎麼回答，3-5句。
topics.sample: Once, I needed to find an ATM. I asked a man, 'Excuse me, where is the nearest ATM?' He kindly explained the directions to me. It was very helpful.

topics.title: Talk About an Amusement Park Visit
topics.prompt: Describe a visit to an amusement park. What did you do and how did you feel?
topics.hint: 描述去遊樂園的經驗，說說玩了什麼、見到什麼和感受，3-5句。
topics.sample: I went to the amusement park last weekend. I rode many fun rides and saw a clown show. It was exciting and I had so much fun.

topics.title: Describe How to Find the Restroom
topics.prompt: Explain how to find the restroom in a public place.
topics.hint: 用英文說明如何找到洗手間，提及方位和路徑，3-4句。
topics.sample: To find the restroom, go to the end of the hall and turn right. It is near the exit. Signs will guide you.

topics.title: Share Your Dinner Plans at a Hotel
topics.prompt: Talk about your usual dinner routine when staying in a hotel.
topics.hint: 描述住飯店時晚餐通常怎麼安排，可以包含餐廳、房間用餐等，3-5句。
topics.sample: When I stay at a hotel, I usually go to the hotel restaurant for dinner. The food is delicious and the service is good. Sometimes, I order room service and eat in my room.
